title: 6.9 Patch notes, Turrets and structures Question.

embed.description: Patch 6.9 is on the way and the official patch notes have been posted! Continue reading for the complete notes, including a massive set of mage changes, info on the new elemental and elder dragons, itemization changes, and much more! Here's the full 6.9 patch notes with an introduction from : Greetings, summoners.

body:
Defensive stats
BASE HEALTH4000 ⇒ 3300
BASE ARMOR0 ⇒ 40
BASE MAGIC RESISTANCE0 ⇒ 40
> _NEWTURRET PENETRATIONTurrets are now subject to armor and magic penetration effects_
> 

Hey everyone, just want to clear up a question that I had while reading the patch notes for tomorrow. Do items such as black cleaver, wits end, effect turret armor ratios per hit? If so are they also effected by champion skills/spells/passives with like effects (such as Kayle's passive or Jayce's R)

Thanks for responces in advance.

replies.body: Towers are still immune to debuffs, so the shreds from Black Cleaver, Wit's End, Amumu's passive etc will continue to have no effect on them.
How does last whisper interact with turrets?

The same way all the other debuffs Meddler listed.
Any item based/champion based debuff will not effect turrets. The only debuffs that effect turrets is the own from the earth dragon, and red buff. Nothing else.

Last whisper is not a debuff.

AFAIK, MPen items such as void staff / haunting guise is pretty effective against turrets. 

Just unsure on how Last whisper would interact as it is "bonus" armor pen only.
I'm pretty sure all the armor on a turret is "bonus"

> [{quoted}](name=LadleLancer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=n9E7OOWg,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-04T01:13:06.783+0000)
>
> The same way all the other debuffs Meddler listed.
> Any item based/champion based debuff will not effect turrets. The only debuffs that effect turrets is the own from the earth dragon, and red buff. Nothing else.

Last Whisper is a debuff?
Turrets don't have bonus armor anymore.
